channel.title: Run Server error help :@
channel.description:
Well i get the following error when i run my server on the run.bat file:
Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Wearing at server.main(server.java:168) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Wearing at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 1 more
[size=24pt]Anyone please help!?[/size]
AND when i try login, it Doesn't work. - Error connecting to server.
HELPPPP !!!!!!

item.description:
@EruptionX wrote:

Ermm, you got msn? mines omgxprodz@hotmail.com…

item.title: Run Server error help :@
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Make sure there’s no anti-leech such as the run.bat or compile.bat isn’t deleting the Wearing.class

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @EruptionX EruptionX
item.description:
@EruptionX wrote:

and i fix that, How? :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error help :@
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Well, what this error means is java cannot find your bytecode file (wearing.class).

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error help :@
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Have you got any errors when compiling?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error help :@
item.dc:creator: @EruptionX EruptionX
item.description:
@EruptionX wrote:

Okay i’ll try that >.> but i think it wont work.

If you get no errors when compiling - Which I assume you don't - then eaither;

A) The class path isn’t right (Not likley)
B) The Wearing.class is getting deleted.

If you do get errors then maybe the Wearing class isn’t compiling properly.

How do i fix the wearing.class??

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error help :@
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Java”]Thrown if the Java Virtual Machine or a ClassLoader instance tries to load in the definition of a class (as part of a normal method call or as part of creating a new instance using the new expression) and no definition of the class could be found.

The searched-for class definition existed when the currently executing class was compiled, but the definition can no longer be found.[/quote]

If you get no errors when compiling - Which I assume you don’t - then eaither;

A) The class path isn’t right (Not likley)
B) The Wearing.class is getting deleted.

If you do get errors then maybe the Wearing class isn’t compiling properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error help :@
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

try editing the run file and replacing with this

@echo off title YourServer java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.7.0-ga-bin.jar server exit
hope this works?

Read full topic
